1.title: Lucky 7
1.plot: Lucky #7 symbolizes a big shift in the lives of all of the Los Angeles Little Women. This season, the ladies of LA are conquering their fears and pushing the boundaries of friendship and success.

2.title: The Boss is Back
2.plot: To help Tonya get her groove back, Terra rents a party bus and invites all the girls out for Tonya's Boss is Back Party! Things take a turn when Terra's friend Mika confronts Elena about her attitude, causing Jasmine to go on the defensive. Now that her twins are getting older, Elena wants to begin focusing on her career again, but worries Preston won't be onboard with her next business venture.

3.title: The Blame Game
3.plot: Christy and Todd are caught off guard when Autumn decides she wants to move out. Elena meets with a real estate broker in hopes of finding a location for her beauty bar, but the reality of how much it will cost, begins to dash her dreams. Terra sets out to make peace with Elena but when Tonya implies that Terra is at fault, the ensuing fight threatens to ruin Jasmine's son's first birthday party.

4.title: Sour Grapes
4.plot: After getting off to a rough start with the girls, Mika proposes a weekend getaway to wine country. Tonya wonders if breaking up with Kerwin is the right decision.

5.title: Injections and Rejections
5.plot: On a quest to regain her self-confidence, Christy throws a botox party. Elena shadows a beauty salon owner, and discovers she may be in over her head.

6.title: Backstabbing Beauties
6.plot: Terra holds a focus group for her controversial wine label. Tonya questions her recent breakup, and shocks the group when she arrives to a party with her ex.

7.title: Sober Celebration
7.plot: Christy celebrates eight years of sobriety, but not everyone is in a festive mood when they find out the guest list includes troublemaker from New York, Lila. Meanwhile, failed business partnerships continue to wreak havoc on the group.

8.title: Sundae Funday
8.plot: Terra and Joe finally get their son's genetic test results, revealing if Grayson is a little person or average size.

9.title: Lil Panty Droppers
9.plot: Christy and Autumn get a reality check when they do a trial run as realtors. Elena struggles with whether or not to apologize to Jasmine over business matters. Meanwhile, Mika visits LA with her husband and daughters.

10.title: Get Happy
10.plot: Terra mentors Mika on starting her own YouTube channel. Christy becomes overprotective when her daughter Autumn wants to go clubbing for the first time.

11.title: The Ultimatum
11.plot: To rejuvenate their bodies, Tonya and Christy venture into the world of plastic surgery. Elena helps her husband Preston with his movie premiere.

12.title: Stage Fright and Heartache
12.plot: When Jasmine's father asks her to sing at his restaurant, her extreme stage fright threatens to ruin the performance before it's begun. Terra struggles with Tonya's demanding she choose between business and friendship. Meanwhile, Christy and Todd have been pretending for months that their marriage is picture perfect, but a confession from Christy brings all their old issues bubbling to the surface.

13.title: Extreme Therapy
13.plot: Sick and tired of all the broken relationships, Christy and Tonya call their relationship guide Hasani. In an intense couples therapy, Todd reveals the truth about why he doesn't agree with Christy's decision to have weight-loss surgery.

14.title: Welcome to Solvang
14.plot: While on a girls bonding weekend in Solvang, California, Jasmine has a terrifying horseback riding experience. Tonya makes a drunken confession to some of the girls about her feelings for Jaa. And later, Mika plays an extreme prank on the girls sending Tonya off the rails.

15.title: Sideways in Solvang
15.plot: The ladies go into Solvang and jump into the local Danish fun. Meanwhile, Mika utters controversial comments on Christy's weight, leading to a nasty food fight in Solvang.

16.title: Kicking and Screaming
16.plot: After weeks of preparing for weight loss surgery, Christy finally goes under the knife. Meanwhile, Terra breaks down after hearing her daughter Penny may need surgery to reduce the pressure on her brain. And when Mika organizes a kickball game, some of the girls feel the team name is offensive to Little People.

17.title: Beauty and the Booze
17.plot: Elena takes a huge step forward towards opening her own beauty salon, by interviewing staff and working with her first vendors. Meanwhile, with just days until her wine launch, Tonya gets news that could cancel the party completely. And after months of fighting, Christy's frustrations with Todd lead her to taking drastic measures.

18.title: Sins and the City
18.plot: After Tonya's daughter dropped the bomb that she wants to move away from home, Tonya plans a girls trip to Las Vegas on a mission to change her daughter's mind.

1.title: The "M" Word
1.plot: Meet the ladies of Little Women: LA, they may be little but they like to live life large. Terra and Tonya enroll the ladies in a sexy dance class so they can all harness their inner goddess. While the ladies celebrate the end of Briana's marriage, Christy drops some very obvious hints about her desire to get married to her boyfriend Todd.

2.title: Little Women, Big Drama
2.plot: Christy goes shopping for her engagement ring even though Todd hasn't popped the question. While the women prepare for their "pinup girl" themed photo shoot, Traci reveals that she's set her wedding date, which aggravates Christy, and ignites a race to the altar. Terra and Elena temporarily mend their tense relationship when Elena reveals a heartbreaking story about growing up as a little person in Russia.

3.title: Who Do You Think You Are?
3.plot: Christy and Traci's bridal battle intensifies as Christy steals Traci's spotlight at her wine tasting party. Elena visits the doctor to find out what type of dwarfism she has and determine potential problems that might arise during pregnancy. When Traci has the women help her pick the perfect wedding gown, their tastes clash and things heat up.

4.title: The Ex-Factor
4.plot: Christy's race to get married is on track, but things start to move too quickly when she discovers she may be pregnant. Concerned with her daughter's well-being, Briana confronts her ex-husband about his new girlfriend. Tonya and Briana go speed dating to spice up their love lives. When Terra and Tonya get ready for a big performance, nothing can prepare them for what happens on stage.

5.title: Movin' on Up
5.plot: Terra has the ladies attend a cooking class and things get zesty as the conversation turns to Tonya's love life. In an effort to lose weight and prepare for their wedding, Christy and Todd diet and enroll in dance lessons. When Terra's boyfriend Joe fawns over Elena, Terra plans a sexy and intimate evening to remind Joe of their spark.

6.title: She's Booty-ful
6.plot: Booty's are the topics of conversation at a pool party when Elena considers breast implants and Terra asks the ladies to star in her "Booty Bee" music video. While Terra's recording her single, Christy tries to convince the women to back out of the video shoot.

7.title: Miss-Conception
7.plot: The ladies attend a wedding convention where the brides-to-be Traci and Christy throw down their bouquets and start a bridal battle. Elena discusses the possibility that she'll have a baby who's a little person and her husband's family is shocked. Terra breaks the news to Tonya that the man she's seeing might not be the good guy she thinks he is.

8.title: Sinner Takes All
8.plot: The little women visit "Sin City" and they're determined to give Las Vegas a run for its money while celebrating Traci and Christy's bachelorette parties. The women buy Traci a few drinks to see if they can loosen her up and are blown away by her hidden wild side. The men join the ladies in Vegas and in a spur of the moment decision Christy decides she wants to elope, but will Todd go along for the ride?

9.title: Here Comes the Bride
9.plot: Christy finalizes her last minute wedding details, from the dress and flower arrangements, to the venue, and quickly realizes her mother is a "momzilla." With wedding bells in the air, Terra and Joe feel pressure to discuss if they are really meant to be together. The ladies speculate why Elena isn't drinking...could there be a baby on the way?

1.title: Baby on Board
1.plot: The Little Women embark on a booze cruise, but it's not all smooth sailing. Traci accuses Briana of lying about why she didn't attend Traci's wedding, but are Briana's mysterious medical reasons true? Terra gets an offer that could change her career, but it would require a huge sacrifice she might not be willing to make. And the baby race is on between Elena, Christy and newly married Traci. But after a pregnancy test comes up positive, the question is, who's pregnant?

2.title: Mama Drama
2.plot: Tonya learns Briana and Trevore have been talking behind her back and things get explosive at lunch with Trevore and his mom. Concerned with hearing her daughter is being bullied, Briana struggles with whether to tell her daughter she's a little person.

3.title: Baby Bump
3.plot: Christy and Briana start questioning Terra's motivations and friendships with the other women. Meanwhile, Traci struggles with her feelings of envy and Elena's burlesque performance exposes her trust issues with her husband.

4.title: A Little Fired Up
4.plot: The Triple T's aren't as tight as they used to be, as Traci and Tonya begin to question Terra's loyalty. And when Traci gets the news she's been dreaming of, she struggles with whether or not to tell her best friend Terra.

5.title: Stage Fight
5.plot: Briana confronts her family on why they aren't willing to meet her new boyfriend. Later, Briana braves the stage at an open mic night, but will she be able to keep the spotlight when Terra surprises everyone and takes the stage as well?

6.title: The Ex-Files
6.plot: Christy and Todd are faced with some unfortunate news, and decide to explore alternative options for having a child. Elena decides to have an uncommon cosmetic enhancement, but worries about how her husband Preston will react to her news. And Terra tries to hook up Tonya with a new man by throwing a "Used-Date Party," but when Christy brings Joe's ex-girlfriend to the event, things get physical.

7.title: Pain in the Butt
7.plot: After Tonya's "Used-Date Party" ends in a nasty brawl, the women try to pick up the shattered pieces of their friendship. Christy, Briana and Lila bring the girls together for a fun 5k race, only to insult Terra and Tonya, igniting another blow-up. Lila throws a cocktail party to make peace, but gets a frosty reception from everyone.

8.title: Into the Woods
8.plot: Terra treats the gang to a fun filled weekend on Catalina Island, but the news that they'll be roughing it on this vacation turns half the group into extremely unhappy campers. The ladies' sense of adventure is soon revitalized by a thrilling day of zip lining, and they reward themselves with a fancy dinner in town. But their meal ends with a bitter taste, as Lila, fed up with the girls, viciously lashes out at each of them.

9.title: Home Wreckers
9.plot: After trying to have a baby for months with no success, Christy and Todd explore IVF and find themselves torn after realizing they have some very big decisions to make. Briana invites the girls out to see her old friend Brad William's comedy show and Tonya isn't amused after he drops the "M" bomb during his routine. And after moving into a new house the week her mom comes to visit from Russia, Elena throws a housewarming party that is anything but warm when Traci and Christy start World War 3 within the group.

10.title: Little Women, Big Easy
10.plot: Following a nasty fight at Elena's house, Christy tries to make peace by bringing the entire group of girls, and their fighting husbands, to New Orleans. The group embraces the Big Easy lifestyle by dining on crawfish, petting alligators, and trying not to snap each others' heads off. But Briana's desire to visit a psychic infuriates Tonya, and everyone's tempers flare hotter than Cajun gumbo.

11.title: New Orleans, New Engagement?
11.plot: While vacationing in New Orleans, tension is at an all-time high as the group anticipates the arrival of Terra's boyfriend Joe, who hasn't seen the rest of the group since a fistfight broke out. Todd and Christy start arguing after he sides with his ex-girlfriend Briana instead of backing up his wife. And while Briana is blindly in love with her new Internet boyfriend, the other women are only seeing red flags, and Christy's ultimate attempt to derail their relationship may blow up in her face.

12.title: Friendtervention
12.plot: Newly engaged Briana is bombarded by her friends' concerns after Terra, Tonya and Traci take it upon themselves to do a background check on her new fiancé. Their shocking finds are too much for Briana to handle, and she struggles to decide whether or not her relationship is strong enough to withstand his past record. Elena's clothing line for both average size and little people starts to take shape, but as people start questioning her vision at the photo shoot, the pressure could prove to be more than she can handle. And as Terra's pregnant belly grows bigger each day...

13.title: Reunion Special Part 1
13.plot: The cast of "Little Women: LA" gets together to revisit the most exciting and dramatic moments from this season as well as provide a sneak peek of what the future holds.

14.title: Reunion Special Part 2
14.plot: The cast of "Little Women: LA" gets together to revisit the most exciting and dramatic moments from this season as well as provide a sneak peek of what the future holds.

1.title: LA Safari
1.plot: TThe Little Women set out for an adventure on an LA Wine Safari tour that quickly turns sour. Briana and Terra introduce new friends, Jasmine and Brittney, to the group, but little do they know that their paths have crossed with several of the girls before. Christy and Todd move forward with their plans for in vitro fertilization and Briana is ready to rekindle a relationship with Matt.

2.title: Big Secrets
2.plot: Jasmine is determined to win the girls over by hosting an extravagant party, but will her husband recently losing his job disrupt her plans? Meanwhile, Christy undergoes a painful IVF procedure and Terra reveals a shocking secret, one that may destroy a relationship forever.

3.title: Seattle or Bust
3.plot: After a fight with the girls, Briana takes Jasmine to Seattle to meet Matt. Christy and Todd struggle with intimacy as the IVF process puts pressure on their relationship. Brittney's dad, David, throws a "Leaving the Nest" BBQ for Brittney and tensions run high as Jasmine calls Tonya out about the problems from their past.

4.title: A Group Divided
4.plot: Christy and Todd's anniversary party turns sour when Christy's mother learns of their pregnancy plans. Elena discloses the dirty details of her relationship with David to Preston and Tonya throws a graduation party for her daughter.

5.title: Love and War
5.plot: Love is in the air, and all the women are upping the ante on their relationships. Brittney gets her flirt on with a new hottie who has boyfriend potential and Briana takes her relationship with Matt to the next level. Tonya lays her heart on the line, and talks to Jaa about the other "M" word: Marriage.

6.title: Working Girls
6.plot: Briana gets a life-changing opportunity to sign with a music agent but when she's put to the test with music producing legend, Kerry Gordy, her vocal talent comes into question. Meanwhile, Christy is recruited to do a comedy music video for which she must get Terra and the other girls to participate, a task which proves more challenging than she might have originally thought.

7.title: Friendship on the Rocks
7.plot: The girls gather at Jasmine's family's restaurant for Margarita Monday where Briana confronts Terra about how unkindly she treats her fiance , Matt. Terra is shocked and she and the girls decide that Briana's relationship with Matt is unhealthy.

8.title: No Pain, No Gain
8.plot: After a year of trying to make a baby, Christy and Todd undergo an artificial insemination procedure and receive their pregnancy test results! Elena starts planning a special event and Briana learns that she was the target of trash talk. Meanwhile, the ladies' bodies and tempers burn red hot on the set of Tonya's Little Boss Workout video and their bad attitudes threaten to shut the project down.

9.title: Off to the Races
9.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

10.title: Bachelorette or Bust
10.plot: The women bust out the bikinis and booze to celebrate Elena's upcoming vow renewal with the bachelorette party she never had. As the girls play steamy bachelorette party games, Brittney surprises the girls when she breaks down over her ex-boyfriend. And Briana drops the mother of all secrets that could cause a major rift between the girls forever.

11.title: Truth and Lies
11.plot: After Briana's surprise announcement in Palm Springs, the women are hurt by the amount of lying Briana's been doing. Can they ever be the close friends they used to be? Meanwhile, vow renewal planning is in full swing, and Elena nervously waits for her family to arrive from Russia.

12.title: Hawaiian Couples Retreat
12.plot: After months of planning, friends and family travel to Elena and Preston's vow renewal in Hawaii! Although happy that her family could travel from Russia, Elena is in a race against the clock.

13.title: Big Vow Renewal
13.plot: While in Hawaii for Elena and Preston's vow renewal, trouble is brewing in paradise not only between the girls, but also with their significant others. Tonya is caught between taking her relationship with Jaa to the next level, or breaking up. Matt crosses the line with some of the women, and later Elena's desire for the dream wedding she never had quickly becomes a nightmare.

14.title: Reunion, Part 1
14.plot: Host Tracey Edmonds sits down with the cast of Little Women: LA to recap the biggest moments from season three. The girls answer tough questions and things get serious when a surprise guest joins them on stage.

15.title: Reunion, Part 2
15.plot: Tracey Edmonds hosts the second half of the Little Women: LA reunion and it's filled with even more surprises. Briana's sister challenges her to reconnect with the family and the ladies find out the real scoop on Matt's online "fling."

16.title: Lost Footage
16.plot: The ladies of Little Women: LA introduce never-before-seen footage from the third season of the show. From extended scenes with family and friends to comedic outtakes, all is revealed.

1.title: MotoCrossed
1.plot: Jasmine hosts a Mommy Cocktail Party so the women can swap tips for raising children as Little People.

2.title: Beauty Brawl
2.plot: After months of working on her Make Up collaboration, Elena finally has a preview party and invites all of her closest friends to test out her beauty products

3.title: Sour Apples
3.plot: Briana has always stood by her man, Matt, even when her friends and family have disagreed with her decision to be with him.

4.title: Oh Baby!
4.plot: Tonya has been on again/off again with her daughter's father, Kerwin, for 20 plus years. When he visits LA, will they be on again for good?

5.title: Couples Party Catastrophe
5.plot: As Briana's Bachelorette party continues in Mexico and the girls are not in a celebratory mood as Briana continues to question which girls are actually there to support her marriage.

6.title: Special Pizza Delivery
6.plot: After Terra's epic fight with Tonya and Elena, the girls are left wondering if they have lost a friendship forever.

7.title: Hostile Housewarming
7.plot: Sensing Briana's separation from the group, Jasmine offers to throw her BFF a bachelorette party. Tonya visits America's TV Eye Doctor Brian Boxer Wachler and learns she'll need to undergo a vision correction procedure, but will Terra be there after Tonya dropped the ball with Penny? Elena learns she's pregnant and although this should be the happiest time in her life, Elena worries that her pregnancy may cause twice the complications. Christy throws a housewarming party and invites all the girls, but an unexpected guest may cause a cooling effect on her cheerful ...

8.title: Cancun or Bust
8.plot: The women head to Cancun for the bachelorette party of an already-married Briana, but not all the girls are ready for a fiesta.

9.title: The Party Continues
9.plot: As Briana's Bachelorette party continues in Mexico and the girls are not in a celebratory mood as Briana continues to question which girls are actually there to support her marriage.

10.title: Crossing the Line
10.plot: The Mexico Bachelorette party wasn't the chance to reconnect with Briana that Terra had hoped for. Now that they're home in LA, Briana is ignoring all of Terra's attempts to reach out to apologize.

11.title: Media Frenzy
11.plot: When Terra confronts Christy about rumors she may be spreading, not just drinks but glasses are thrown, and Christy ends up in the hospital.

12.title: Ride or Die Wedding
12.plot: Fresh from the social media craze caused by the altercation between Christy and Terra, the women find themselves struggling to switch gears for Briana and Matt's upcoming nuptials.

13.title: Baby Showers and Blindsides
13.plot: Elena and Preston finally get to find out the gender of their twins, and decide to share the good news at their upcoming baby shower.

14.title: Reunion: Part 1
14.plot: Kevin Frazier hosts the Little Women: LA Season 4 reunion. From baby announcements, to police reports, to sexting scandals and everything in between, the women hash out all the dirty little details.

15.title: Reunion: Part 2
15.plot: As Kevin Frazier hosts the second half of the reunion show, at times he feels like he's in a wrestling ring, as the women of Little Women: LA get heated over some of the biggest scandals of Season 4.

16.title: Matt and Briana - Part 1
16.plot: After learning the extent of her husband Matt's infidelity, Briana tries to figure out the future for her family. After spending time apart, Briana and Matt see each other again at the Little Women: LA reunion.

17.title: Matt and Briana - Part 2
17.plot: Briana allows Matt to take her daughter to a school dance, creating friction with her ex-husband. After reconnecting with her birth mother and seeking the advice of a therapist, Briana makes a choice about the future or her marriage.

1.title: Spa Day Sparring
1.plot: With the birth of her twins rapidly approaching, Elena is feeling the stress of becoming a new mommy and invites the girls to a relaxing spa retreat.

2.title: Drama & Drag Queens
2.plot: After a not so relaxing spa retreat, Christy finds herself as the odd man out. But when the girls find themselves at a Drag Queen Convention, will Christy prove to be the biggest drama queen of them all?

3.title: Lost & Found
3.plot: After eight days in the hospital, Briana deals with the emotional trauma of her near death experience, but also sets the record straight with the ladies regarding why she's been in hiding.

4.title: Twins and Tears
4.plot: Jasmine hosts Briana's baby shower, but with Briana at odds with the other girls over Matt, Jasmine hopes her guest list has more than one invitee.

5.title: Deconstructive Criticism
5.plot: Elena is finally released from the hospital after giving birth to her twins, but arrives home with Preston empty handed, as their boys are still recovering in the NICU.

6.title: Tough as Nails
6.plot: After receiving an ultimatum, Tonya tries to prove to Kerwin that her ex-boyfriend means nothing to her, but when the two men meet for the first time things don't go according to plan.

7.title: Wild West Showdown
7.plot: Wanting her Texas man to feel at home in LA, Tonya plans a Western party for Kerwin.

8.title: Pre-Pop Party
8.plot: After being served papers, Briana questions Christy's involvement with her legal troubles and wonders if she is breaking her sobriety.

9.title: Murder She Wrote
9.plot: Briana recovers from a very difficult pregnancy while her new baby is monitored in the NICU.

10.title: Plastic Problems
10.plot: Terra gets her dance on when her friend Jason visits from New York, and reveals a secret to him that she's too scared to tell the girls.

11.title: Birthday Blowout
11.plot: With Elena's mom and sister visiting from Russia, Preston plans a huge surprise birthday party, that ultimately leaves Elena in tears.

12.title: Belly Dance Battle
12.plot: Jasmine worries that an off handed comment Terra made, is actually a sign that their friendship isn't as strong as Jasmine thought it was.

13.title: Terra's Growing Family
13.plot: After being isolated from the girls for weeks, Christy reaches out to Jasmine to help her mend fences, but Jasmine is reluctant that anyone will be willing to give her another shot.

14.title: Name Game
14.plot: After receiving threats, Briana goes to extreme measures to protect her family, despite objections from the other girls.

15.title: High Stakes Friendship
15.plot: After arriving home from the hospital, Terra continues to fight with Joe over the name of their new son. Meanwhile, in a grand gesture of reconciliation, Christy invites the girls to a Casino Night.

16.title: Playing with Fire
16.plot: With Christy's Casino Night blowing up in her face, she apologizes and begs for help to fix her relationship with Terra and Briana. Meanwhile, Terra worries about meeting her Dancing with the Stars partner for the first time. Tonya invites the girls to a survivalist retreat, hoping that being isolated in the forest will force them to work together, and rely on each other. But when the sun goes down, true feelings come out. Will anyone make it out of the woods as friends?

17.title: Sail Away
17.plot: Tonya's survivalist retreat allowed the girls to get all of their hurt feelings out in the open, but most still seem stuck at an impasse. Elena decides it's time to remind the group why maintaining they're friendship matters, with a fun day of land sailing in the desert.

1.title: Ballroom Blitz
1.plot: The girls feel that Terra has changed since she began competing on Dancing with the Stars, and fears she is sacrificing her family

2.title: Tough Crowd
2.plot: Terra has made it to the semi-finals of Dancing with the Stars, but with two hernias, a bevy of other health issues, and waning support from friends, the pressure seems to be closing in from all directions.

3.title: Things Fall Apart
3.plot: Briana worries she might be suffering from Postpartum Depression. After life threatening complications during her ground breaking surgery, Christy's recovery is even harder than anticipated, and she's frustrated with Todd's lack of help.

4.title: On Thin Ice
4.plot: After months of dealing with a tough pregnancy, Jasmine's delivery isn't as easy as she would have hoped for. Briana is rushed to the hospital with severe pain, and worries she could need surgery.

5.title: The Girl Who Cried Divorce
5.plot: With limited help from husband Todd, and a lack of concern from her friends, Christy's recovery from neck surgery is lonelier than she ever expected.

6.title: Vision Quest
6.plot: Terra throws a vision board party and confronts Briana about rumors that she tried to steal Terra's manager.

7.title: Big Little Lies
7.plot: Elena and Preston have spent months wondering if one or both of their twin boys has dwarfism.

8.title: March Madness
8.plot: Terra and Tonya rally at the LA Women's March, but Briana bails because she thinks Terra is going for the wrong reasons.

9.title: Bringing Sexy Back
9.plot: Briana and Terra's feud continues to heat up when Terra belittles Briana in front of the girls. Meanwhile, Elena voices her criticism of Mary's couture clothing designs, and Mary throws Elena's own failed fashion line in her face.

10.title: Model Behavior
10.plot: When Mary holds runway auditions for her London fashion show, Elena puts her on blast for not being authentic.

11.title: Shady Business
11.plot: Terra is thrilled her dream of writing a book is becoming real and meets with her editor for the first time. But when she breaks her big news to the girls, not everyone is happy for her. Elena thinks Terra doesn't make her family her first priority and questions making Terra the Godmother to her twin boys.

12.title: Baptism Blowout
12.plot: Terra receives terrifying results from her mammogram, and is faced with the possibility of having breast cancer. Christy is overwhelmed by her nagging mom and bratty teenage daughter.

13.title: Fractured Friendships
13.plot: When Terra meets with Elena to apologize for exploding at the twin's baptism party, Elena refuses to listen and takes the conversation to a whole new level.

14.title: Big Trouble, Little Video
14.plot: On the heels of her successful fashion show, Tonya's stress levels are through the roof. Not only has her beloved dog been stolen, but she still faces major issues with her manufacture.

15.title: Fierce Fight
15.plot: Christy is shocked to hear that Terra has been showing off a scandalous video from her past. Meanwhile, Briana reaches out to Terra for career advice, but is blindsided to find out that people are talking about a very sensitive topic behind her back.

16.title: Warrior Dash
16.plot: Since the birth of her son, Jasmine fears that her and Chris have become less like husband and wife and more like roommates. Terra is down to the wire to obtain releases before her book launch and makes a last-ditch effort to get Christy and Briana to sign. And when the girls participate in a Warrior Dash, Briana approaches Tonya about rumors that Tonya has been spreading about her, ultimately causing all the girls to air their dirty laundry.

17.title: Alaska Adventure
17.plot: Briana is shocked to find out about Terra's latest sneaky business move, which could have a major impact on Briana's career. Jasmine's husband Chris finally gets his long awaited notice of a job opening, but it puts Jasmine in a sticky situation as she nears the end of her maternity leave. And Terra arranges a couple's vacation trip to Alaska, hoping to give the group a chance to reconnect as friends. But when Tonya goes against Terra's wishes and invites Christy, Terra retaliates by blasting her on social media the night before the trip. Upon arriving in Alaska, the ...

18.title: Interventions and Infidelity
18.plot: After Terra's meltdown on the mountain, Jasmine and Elena feel that she is out of control and decide it's time for a friendship intervention. Terra and Joe try to play matchmaker with Tonya and Kerwin, to help get them down the aisle faster. Meanwhile, Briana and Matt try to reconnect after a huge fight leaves Matt missing for several hours. But when Terra breaks the news that Matt was spotted around the hotel with another woman, Briana's worst fears are confirmed.

19.title: Crazy in Love
19.plot: After hearing Matt's shocking confession, Briana is yet again, at a crossroad in her marriage. Meanwhile, Tonya and Kerwin shop for engagement rings, but Tonya's dreams of a three-carat diamond may be too much pressure for Kerwin to handle. And when Elena invites the girls out to dinner, Terra brings the night out to a screeching halt when she starts fighting with Christy and Elena and the girls decide to leave.

20.title: '80s Prom
20.plot: In the wake of the fight between Terra and Elena, both girls are left questioning their friendship. Can they be besties again, or frienemies forever? Briana and Matt seek marriage counseling, but after everything Matt has put her through, will Briana be able to trust him again? And when Jasmine hosts a totally '80s Prom, Tonya is forced to make the biggest decision of her life.

21.title: Season 6 Reunion, Part 1
21.plot: Host Kevin Frazier brings the ladies of Little Women: LA together to discuss the craziness of Season 6. When Kevin interrogates Terra on her hypocritical actions with Christy, Joe interjects from the sidelines to defend his wife. Later, Briana's former friend Lisa sets the record straight about the inappropriate texts Briana's husband Matt sent her. And when Matt joins the stage, all hell breaks loose when the women demand explanations for Matt cheating on Briana in Alaska.

22.title: Season 6 Reunion, Part 2
22.plot: The reunion continues when Stephania joins the group to reveal all the juicy details of her scandalous night in Alaska with Briana's husband Matt. Later, Mary breaks down while defending her fights with Tonya and Elena.

23.title: Couples Retreat: Trouble in Paradise
23.plot: After getting engaged to Kerwin, Tonya organizes a couples' retreat in Puerto Rico, but she gets more than she bargained for when surprise guests crash the trip

24.title: Couples Retreat: Express Yourself
24.plot: Christy and Todd open up and share things they've never told each other before. The Tiny Twins make twerking a relationship building exercise.

25.title: Couples Retreat: Breakfast Beef
25.plot: The day kicks off with a bang when a private argument at breakfast quickly turns public and heated. Meanwhile Todd is eager to have new life experiences with Christy, while Jazmin and David's relationship hits a stumbling block when David reveals an intimate secret.

26.title: Couples Retreat: Don't Poke the Bear
26.plot: When Chris calls out Matt for crossing the line, tension boils and shirts come off. Tonya and Kerwin finally admit that they may have problems they'll never be able to work through. And Hasani's activity for the day pushes the group over the edge.

27.title: Busting Up
27.plot: After a partner swap, Matt tries to make amends with the group and Christy realizes that her mothering ways may have killed the passion in her marriage. Meanwhile, Amanda confronts Andrea about moving back to Atlanta and wonders if the Tiny Twins are over for good?

28.title: Twin Explosion
28.plot: The couples are challenged to let go of the past, but Andrea can't, and things get heated when she finally confronts Chris. Briana and Christy begin to repair their friendship while Tonya questions if Kerwin is "the one"?

29.title: Couples Retreat: Flight or Fight
29.plot: Emotions run high as Jazmin pushes David past his comfort zone and a repetitive fight makes Tonya and Kerwin rethink their future together.

30.title: Couples Retreat: Girls on Top
30.plot: As the retreat draws to a close, two couples plan to renew their wedding vows, but Jazmin and David hit a snag when it comes to planning the ceremony. Meanwhile, Andrea and Chris make a life-changing decision.

33.title: Terra's Big House: Budget Blues
33.plot: 'Tis the season to be salty! The ladies tear into both the wrapping paper and each other as they exchange holiday gifts and relive the most memorable fights.

-1.title: Reunion Part 2
-1.plot: The reunion continues when the men join to talk about all the new arrivals to their families. Is Briana ready to let Tonya off the hook for saying she would be better off raising an "average size" child?

imdb.title: Little Women: LA
plot: A reality TV show about five friends and their lives together and apart.::Aaron Saltzer
